title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 1698/80 of 30 June 1980 supplementing Regulation (EEC) No 797/80 adjusting export levies and refunds fixed in advance in the sugar sector
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 1698/80  of 30 June 1980  supplementing Regulation (EEC) No 797/80 adjusting export levies and refunds fixed in advance in the sugar sector
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Article 1 of Regulation (EEC) No 797/80 shall be amended as follows:    1. In the first paragraph the phrase "at the request of the party concerned", is deleted.
2. The following is inserted in paragraph 2 as the third subparagraph:
"Where the amount of the export levy is less than the amount of the adjustment, the difference between those two amounts shall be considered as an export refund to be granted to the party concerned. In such a case, the export levy shall not be payable."

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 July 1980.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 30 June 1980.
For the Commission
Finn GUNDELACH
